My Projects

I'm passionate about crafting thoughtful solutions that meet user needs. Here, you'll find my projects in product design, UX/UI design, and user research, showcasing my skills in user-centered design, design thinking, and data-driven decision-making.

Please note: this side is currently just a small selection of my projects. A lot of my older projects still need to be put into pictures and prose and uploaded in this portfolio.

Audiobooks in Spotify

I used Design Thinking to empathize with audiobook listeners and create a prototype to integrate audiobooks into Spotify.

Dezember 2022

Creating the app Planeatary

Planeatary is a mobile app designed to support users to follow a healthy and environmentally friendly diet.

March 2019 ➙ January 2021

Critical States in D3 Sheets

Improving the usability of the important “Critical States” feature in the foreign exchange pricing software D3 Sheets by Digitec GmBH.

July 2020 ➙ October 2020

Usability of Cookie Notices

I conducted an eye-tracking study to investigate the usability of common types of cookie notices, and designed a prototype for better usability.

November 2019 ➙ September 2020

UI Control Redesign

Redesigning the controls for the D3 product family by Digitec GmBH, with the goal to modernize the interface and to standardize the usage of different control states.

February 2020 ➙ April 2020

Creating a Pattern Library

Creation of a comprehensive pattern library for the D3 product family of Digitec GmbH, for documentation and standardization of used design patterns.

October 2018 ➙ Dezember 2018

Reducing Cyber Sickness in Virtual Reality

Investigation of the reduction of cyber sickness in virtual reality by introducing a fixed point (helicopter cockpit).

October 2017 ➙ March 2018

Let's connect

Get in touch for opportunities or just to say hi!
